ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a 《ギガント》 Character, add it to Hand, choose 1 card from your Hand, place it into Waiting Room. （If it is not, return revealed card to its original position）

【A】 At the beginning of your Climax Phase, if this card is in the Front Row, if you are the player going first and it's your first turn, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card from your Hand, place it into Stock, during that turn, you cannot attack.

When this card becomes REVERSE during battle, REST this card.』 （Damage can be cancelled）
